page.title: 12WARESIDE VILLAGE STORES
page.content: Every morning is the same at the village stores.Dad wakes mum with a cup of coffee.My brother delivers the papers.Eventually I emerge from bed.I have to wash,dress and tidy my room by eight o'clock.By then my brother is serving early customers and calling for me to take over so that he can catch the school bus to Hertford.Soon mum appears while I finish in the house. By the time I arrive at school I'm fully awake for what lies ahead.School is generally interesting although if I'm tired my mind wanders,I lose concentration,go into a daydream and switch off lessons. School is out by half past three.I play tennis or bowls with my friend till seven o'clock.In winter I go home to watch television or a video.
